verses.verse: And it came to pass <WH4428>, when all the kings of the Amorites <WH567>, which were on the side <WH5676> of Jordan <WH3383> westward <WH3220>, and all the kings <WH4428> of the Canaanites <WH3669>, which were by the sea <WH3220>, heard <WH8085> that the Lord <WH3068> had dried up <WH3001> the waters <WH4325> of Jordan <WH3383> from before <WH6440> the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>, until we were passed over <WH5674>, that their heart <WH3824> melted <WH4549>, neither was there spirit <WH7307> in them any more <WH6440>, because of the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>.

At that time <WH6256> the Lord <WH3068> said <WH559> unto Joshua <WH3091>, Make <WH6213> you sharp <WH6697> knives <WH2719>, and circumcise <WH4135> again <WH7725> the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> the second time <WH8145>.
And Joshua <WH3091> made <WH6213> him sharp <WH6697> knives <WH2719>, and circumcised <WH4135> the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> at the hill <WH1389> of the foreskins <WH6190>.

And this is the cause <WH1697> why Joshua <WH3091> did circumcise <WH4135>: All the people <WH5971> that came out <WH3318> of Egypt <WH4714>, that were males <WH2145>, even all the men <WH582> of war <WH4421>, died <WH4191> in the wilderness <WH4057> by the way <WH1870>, after they came out <WH3318> of Egypt <WH4714>.

Now <WH3588> all the people <WH5971> that came out <WH3318> were circumcised <WH4135>: but all the people <WH5971> that were born <WH3209> in the wilderness <WH4057> by the way <WH1870> as they came forth <WH3318> out of Egypt <WH4714>, them they had not circumcised <WH4135>.

For the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> walked <WH1980> forty <WH705> years <WH8141> in the wilderness <WH4057>, until all the people <WH1471> that were men <WH582> of war <WH4421>, which came out <WH3318> of Egypt <WH4714>, were consumed <WH8552>, because they obeyed <WH8085> not the voice <WH6963> of the Lord <WH3068>: unto whom the Lord <WH3068> swore <WH7650> that he would not show <WH7200> them the land <WH776>, which the Lord <WH3068> swore <WH7650> unto their fathers <WH1> that he would give <WH5414> us <WH776>, a land that flows <WH2100> with milk <WH2461> and honey <WH1706>.

And their sons <WH1121>, whom he raised up <WH6965> in their stead <WH3091>, them Joshua circumcised <WH4135>: for they were uncircumcised <WH6189>, because they had not circumcised <WH4135> them by the way <WH1870>.
And it came to pass <WH8552>, when they had done circumcising <WH4135> all the people <WH1471>, that they lived <WH3427> in their places in the camp <WH4264>, until they were whole <WH2421>.

And the Lord <WH3068> said <WH559> unto Joshua <WH3091>, This day <WH3117> have I rolled away <WH1556> the reproach <WH2781> of Egypt <WH4714> from off you <WH8034>. Why the name of the place <WH4725> is called <WH7121> Gilgal <WH1537> unto this day <WH3117>.

And the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> encamped <WH2583> in Gilgal <WH1537>, and kept <WH6213> the passover <WH6453> on the fourteenth <WH702> day <WH3117> of the month <WH2320> at even <WH6153> in the plains <WH6160> of Jericho <WH3405>.

And they did eat <WH398> of the old corn <WH5669> of the land <WH776> on the next day <WH4283> after the passover <WH6453>, unleavened cakes <WH4682>, and parched <WH7033> corn in the same <WH6106> day <WH3117>.

And the manna <WH4478> ceased <WH7673> on the next day <WH4283> after they had eaten <WH398> of the old corn <WH5669> of the land <WH776>; neither had the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> manna <WH4478> any more <WH398>; but they did eat of the fruit <WH8393> of the land <WH776> of Canaan <WH3667> that year <WH8141>.

And it came to pass <WH3091>, when Joshua was by Jericho <WH3405>, that he lifted up <WH5375> his eyes <WH5869> and looked <WH7200>, and <WH5975>, behold, there stood a man <WH376> over against him with his sword <WH2719> drawn <WH8025> in his hand <WH3027>: and Joshua <WH3091> went <WH3212> unto him <WH559>, and said unto him <WH6862>, Are you for us, or for our adversaries?

And he said <WH559>, No <WH8269>; but as captain of the host <WH6635> of the Lord <WH3068> am I now come <WH935>. And Joshua <WH3091> fell <WH5307> on his face <WH6440> to the earth <WH776>, and did worship <WH7812>, and said <WH559> unto him <WH1696>, What says my lord <WH113> unto his servant <WH5650>?

And the captain <WH8269> of the Lord <WH3068>'s host <WH6635> said <WH559> unto Joshua <WH3091>, Loose <WH5394> your shoe <WH5275> from off your foot <WH7272>; for the place <WH4725> whereon you stand <WH5975> is holy <WH6944>. And Joshua <WH3091> did so <WH6213>.
